Microblade Eyebrow Pencil for tat brow look, Microblading Eyebrow Pen make up, Tattoo Pen for Every Skin Type with Long Lasting Quality, Waterproof Brow Pen Chestnut-Dark Brown

['Cloud Retailers Presents', 'Music Flower Eyebrow Tattoo Pen Microblading-3D Fork Tip', 'This new and revolutionary smudge-proof long lasting eyebrow pen features a micro fork tip applicator that creates hair-like strokes lasting all day to hopefully replace the old-school pencils.', 'Regarding Colors:', 'Dark Grey is recommended for Black/Dark Grey eyebrows.', 'Dark Grey is recommended for Black/Dark Grey eyebrows.', 'Brown is recommended for Brown/Auburn eyebrows (this is a Reddish Brown).', 'Brown is recommended for Brown/Auburn eyebrows (this is a Reddish Brown).', 'Chestnut is recommended for Brown/Dark Blonde eyebrows (Cool Brown).', 'Chestnut is recommended for Brown/Dark Blonde eyebrows (Cool Brown).', 'INSTRUCTIONS:', 'Note: After applying once you achieve the desired shape allow the pigmentation to dry.', 'Step 1: Start with clean and dry skin. Do not apply after putting lotion on, this will make the eyebrow pen less effective.', 'Step 1:', 'Start with clean and dry skin.', 'Do not apply after putting lotion on', ', this will make the eyebrow pen less effective.', "Step 2: Use a light hand, don't press hard. Raise the pen tip 45 degrees and gently draw along the growth direction of the eyebrows (If your eyebrows are not sparse, you can also draw straight across your eyebrows to create a fuller look.)", 'Step 2:', "Use a light hand, don't press hard. Raise the pen tip 45 degrees and gently draw along the growth direction of the eyebrows (If your eyebrows are not sparse, you can also draw straight across your eyebrows to create a fuller look.)", 'Step 3: Fill the eyebrows with the wide part of the pen.', 'Step 3:', 'Fill the eyebrows with the wide part of the pen.', 'Step 4: For the end of your brow, tilt the pen to fill the area with the narrower part of the pen.', 'Step 4:', 'For the end of your brow, tilt the pen to fill the area with the narrower part of the pen.', 'Step 5: Correct any mistakes to get your desired shape and then let it dry for a few seconds.', 'Step 5:', 'Correct any mistakes to get your desired shape and then let it dry for a few seconds.', 'Initially it will be slightly wet but that gives you the chance to fix any mistakes.', 'STORAGE', 'Use and store with the tip positioned lower than the end of the pen to ease and prolong its use as this is similar to a marker or pen. Also, always close cap tightly.', "Enjoy this unique fork like design enabling you to get perfectly defined, naturally beautiful, hair-like brows that WOW. If you have any questions on how to use the product please don't hesitate to contact us."]

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Category Preference:** The user continues to expand their interests in hair care, now also exploring hair accessories that complement styling, such as hair extensions. Their focus remains on moisturizing products and eyebrow grooming tools.
- **Product Type:** Engages with a wide variety of hair products, including conditioning cleansers, moisturizing shampoos, conditioners, edge control gels, and now hair extensions, indicating a growing interest in styling aids.
- **Brand Affinity:** Maintains a preference for brands that emphasize natural ingredients and has an appreciation for cost-effective options—this remains consistent despite varied interactions, reflecting their discerning nature.
- **Review Tone:** Generally positive but increasingly critical, as demonstrated by a high rating for an accessory that met expectations, contrasting with previous disappointment in edge control effectiveness. This suggests flexibility based on product context.
- **Rating Tendencies:** Displays a pattern of high standards for product performance, willing to give favorable ratings when products meet their criteria.
- **Interaction Frequency:** Actively explores a diverse array of hair and beauty items, with a commitment to ingredient quality, performance, and ease of use.
- **Trend Awareness:** Appreciates natural ingredients while remaining open to products that enhance aesthetics, reflecting a holistic approach to beauty.
- **Simplicity in Use:** Prefers straightforward, effective solutions, emphasizing performance and satisfaction in both hair care and accessory choices.

Overall, the profile highlights a complex user dedicated to quality, increasingly vocal about their expectations across hair care and styling products.
